title: Women at work: change, choice, challenge
creator_credit: William Kay and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Presents on-the-job profiles of women in a variety of careers, including traditionally male-dominated ones. Explores the attitudes that direct women toward particular career choices, and indicates some of the problems both men and women encounter in competing for jobs and as co-workers.
